@@ -549,2 +549,4 @@ - * native code. This method returns {@code true} if the thread is executing - * a native method or if executing native code invoked using a {@linkplain + * native code. + * + *

A thread is considered to be executing native code when it is executing a + * native method, executing native code invoked using a {@linkplain @@ -552,1 +554,9 @@ - * method handle} obtained from the {@linkplain Linker native linker}. + * method handle} obtained from the {@linkplain Linker native linker}, or is + * + * attached to the VM with the + * Java Native Interface with no Java frames on its stack. + * + *

Native code does not include Java virtual machine support code, + * compiled code generated by the Java virtual machine, or special cases + * such as a thread blocked on a + * JVM TI raw monitor.
